name: Death Hound

skills.name: Neck Bite
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Will ignore [Shield] and [Block Damage] buffs. Will Ignore DEF if this attack is critical.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +5%

skills.name: Gnaw
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Places a 5% [Poison] debuff for 2 turns. Damage inflicted is proportional to DEF.
Damage based on: [DEF]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1
